instructions: Tap For You, then tap the My Account button . Tap Start Sharing with Friends. Friends can now follow you.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile at the top of the screen.

Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Tap Edit, then tap People You Approve if you want to be followed only by people you choose. Tap Follow Requests, then accept or decline the requests.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Tap Edit, then turn playlists on or off. Drag the reorder button to reorder them.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Touch and hold the playlist or album (below Listening To). Tap Hide from Profile.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Tap the More button , tap Share, then choose a sharing option.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . Tap Account Circle and then Help & Feedback and then Send Feedback . Select the affected road. From the list that appears at the bottom, tap the place or road you want to fix. Follow onscreen instructions to send your feedback.
